itemDisplayName: Deploy a 5 Node 1 Nodetype Windows Service Fabric Cluster with standard load balancer, NSG, AAD, and Automatic OS Upgrade using a 'common name' certificate
description: This template allows you to deploy a secure 5 node Service Fabric Cluster running Windows Server 2022 Datacenter on a Standard_DS4_v2 Size VMSS.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys 5 Node Service Fabric Cluster running windows
